subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The rookie defenseman Alexandre Picard had the first two assists of his N.H.L. career and the Philadelphia Flyers used three special teams goals to defeat the host Islanders, 3-2, Thursday night.
snippet: The rookie defenseman Alexandre Picard had the first two assists of his N.H.L. career and the Philadelphia Flyers used three special teams goals to defeat the host Islanders, 3-2, Thursday night.
